divs: Sighting Detailsi was traveling west bound on us.route 6 into channahon. as i was approaching us 55 i noticed a bright light in the sky that was hanging low to the ground. it was lightning out so i couldn't tell what it was at first. as i got closer to highway 55 i noticed it dropped a bit but was hovering over us route 6. i stopped my car on route 6 and turned off my radio. no sounds were coming from the craft. it hovered there for about 8 or 9 seconds and then traveled south east on route 6. the craft had 3 small round white lights in back. on one side of the craft it had a blue blinking light, on the other side it had a red solidly lit light. it seems to be long skinny triangle with wings. it was silent. if it was a jet or a helicopter i would have been able to hear the sounds but this was silent. i freaked out and noticed a car vastly approaching behind me so i turned off onto the southbound frontage road and watch it slowly move south east and then vanish.
Summary: 3 white lights with blue blinking light and a solid red light.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Channahon
There were no other sightings in Channahon on or around June 8th 2009
